result.title: Prototype of the INCISION Academy 0.5
result.description:
Prototype of the INCISION Academy 0.5 with the following features: - INCISION front-end identity - Solutions for 2D & 3D video delivery (from WP2) - Solution for Virtual Reality (from WP3) - Accessible from mobile, tablet & computers - Linked to Payment Service Provider - 80 Modules online (from WP2 and 3)
We will provide a deliverable report to the EC and enable online demonstration.
This deliverable is related to Task 5.1.
